verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H539>But<s%>, behold, they will not believe <S%H8085>me<s%>, nor hearken unto my <S%H6963>voice<s%>; for they will <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath not appeared unto <S%H7200>thee<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3027>him<s%>, What is that in thy hand? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, A <S%H4294>rod<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7993>Cast<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground<s%>. And he <S%H7993>cast<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and it became a <S%H5175>serpent<s%>; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from before <S%H6440>it<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Put <S%H7971>forth<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H270>take<s%> it by the <S%H2180>tail<s%> (and he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4294>it<s%>, and it became a rod in his <S%H3709>hand<s%>);

that they may <S%H539>believe<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, hath appeared unto <S%H7200>thee<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5750>furthermore<s%> unto <S%H935>him<s%>, Put now thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> into thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%>. And he <S%H935>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> into his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>: and when he <S%H3318>took<s%> it <S%H3027>out<s%>, behold, his hand was <S%H6879>leprous<s%>, as white as <S%H7950>snow<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7725>Put<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> into thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>. (And he <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> into his <S%H2436>bosom<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>; and when he <S%H3318>took<s%> it out of his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, <S%H7725>behold<s%>, it was turned again as his other <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.)

And it shall come to <S%H539>pass<s%>, if they will not believe <S%H8085>thee<s%>, neither hearken to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%>, that they will <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H539>pass<s%>, if they will not believe even these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%>, neither <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto thy <S%H6963>voice<s%>, that thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>, and <S%H8210>pour<s%> it upon the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H4325>land<s%>: and the water which thou <S%H3947>takest<s%> out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall become <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the dry <S%H3006>land<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H994>Oh<s%>, <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H376>I<s%> am not <S%H1697>eloquent<s%>, neither <S%H8032>heretofore<s%>, nor <S%H227>since<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>; for I am <S%H3515>slow<s%> of <S%H6310>speech<s%>, and of a <S%H3515>slow<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7760>him<s%>, Who hath made <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%>? Or who <S%H7760>maketh<s%> a man <S%H483>dumb<s%>, or <S%H2795>deaf<s%>, or <S%H6493>seeing<s%>, or <S%H5787>blind<s%>? is it not <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah?
Now therefore <S%H3212>go<s%>, and I will be with thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee what thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H994>Oh<s%>, <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H7971>send<s%>, I pray <S%H3027>thee<s%>, by the hand of him whom thou wilt <S%H7971>send<s%>.

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Is there not <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>? I <S%H3045>know<s%> that he can <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1696>well<s%>. And <S%H3318>also<s%>, behold, he cometh forth to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7200>thee<s%>: and when he seeth <S%H8055>thee<s%>, he will be glad in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H7760>him<s%>, and put the <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: and I will be with thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and will <S%H3384>teach<s%> you what ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%>.
And he shall be thy <S%H1696>spokesman<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and it shall come to <S%H6310>pass<s%>, that he shall be to thee a mouth, and thou shalt be to him as <S%H430>God<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> this <S%H4294>rod<s%>, wherewith thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3500>Jethro<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>him<s%>, Let me go, I pray <S%H7725>thee<s%>, and return unto my <S%H251>brethren<s%> that are in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> whether they be <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%>. And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; for all the <S%H582>men<s%> are <S%H4191>dead<s%> that <S%H1245>sought<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H7392>set<s%> them upon an <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, When thou <S%H3212>goest<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H7200>see<s%> that thou <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> all the <S%H4159>wonders<s%> which I have <S%H7760>put<s%> in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>: but I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and he will not let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is my <S%H1121>son<s%>, my <S%H1060>first-born<s%>:

and I have said unto <S%H1121>thee<s%>, Let my son <S%H7971>go<s%>, that he may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3985>me<s%>; and thou hast refused to let him <S%H7971>go<s%>: <S%H2026>behold<s%>, I will slay thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, thy <S%H1060>first-born<s%>.
And it came to pass on the <S%H1870>way<s%> at the <S%H4411>lodging-place<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6298>met<s%> <S%H1245>him<s%>, and sought to kill <S%H4191>him<s%>.

Then <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6864>flint<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> of her <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H5060>cast<s%> it at his <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and she <S%H559>said<s%>, Surely a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> of blood art thou to <S%H1818>me<s%>.
So he let him <S%H7503>alone<s%>. Then she <S%H559>said<s%>, A <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> art <S%H4139>thou<s%>, because of the circumcision.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>. And he <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H6298>met<s%> him in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and kissed <S%H5401>him<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> wherewith he had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H226>him<s%>, and all the signs wherewith he had charged <S%H6680>him<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%>: and when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H6485>visited<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and that he had <S%H7200>seen<s%> their <S%H6040>affliction<s%>, then they bowed their <S%H6915>heads<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%>.
